coding_practice.title: Word Subsets
coding_practice.description:
You are given two string arrays words1 and words2.
A string b is a subset of string a if every letter in b occurs in a including multiplicity.
For example, "wrr" is a subset of "warrior" but is not a subset of "world".
A string a from words1 is universal if for every string b in words2, b is a subset of a.
Return an array of all the universal strings in words1. You may return the answer in any order.
coding_practice.constraints:
1 <= words1.length, words2.length <= 10^4
1 <= words1[i].length, words2[i].length <= 10
words1[i] and words2[i] consist only of lowercase English letters.
All the strings of words1 are unique.
coding_practice.explanation:
1. 使用 Counter 計算 words2 中每個字母的最大需求次數，合併成 max_b。
2. 遍歷 words1，對每個單詞 a 計算其 Counter。
3. 若 max_b - Counter(a) 結果為空，代表 a 滿足所有 words2 的需求，加入結果 res。
4. 返回 res。
